comment:
Extracted Variables:
- \( bus\_trips \): number of trips taken by bus
- \( car\_trips \): number of trips taken by car
- \( total\_time \): total time needed to transport the chicken

Extracted Constraints:
1. \( bus\_trips \times 100 + car\_trips \times 40 = 1200 \) (total number of chickens to transport)
2. \( bus\_trips \leq 10 \) (at most 10 bus trips)
3. \( car\_trips \geq 0.6 \times (bus\_trips + car\_trips) \) (at least 60% of trips must be by car)

Objective:
Minimize \( total\_time = bus\_trips \times 2 + car\_trips \times 1.5 \)
